name: Gravity (itch) (Deliciouzlp)
description:
Welcome to the "Research Centre for Artificial Gravity".

In our current project we managed to give our slimy test subjects the ability to change their gravity. It is now up to you to aid them through different tests and complete our research.

FEATURES:

-16 Levels

-Unlockable Skins

-Dangerous Puzzles

-Full Controller-Support

-COOKIES
